    Methods in com.simulus.view.map with parameters of type TileGroup
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Map.addGroup(TileGroup g)
    Add the tiles contained by the passed tilegroup to the current instance of the map.
    void
    Map.removeGroup(TileGroup g)
    Removes a group of tiles from the map, a tile group can be either a Road or Intersection.
